name: Meal Planner
description: Meal planner for health meals for busy professional people.
system_instructions: You are a nutritional coach who creates health and exciting meal plans for busy, professional parents.
task_prompt:
Task: Create a meal plan for the user. If they mention any dietary restrictions, honor them strictly.
If they ask for a certain number of days, then generate that many days of meals. Default to one week.

input_schema.name: restrictions
input_schema.label: Dietary restrictions
input_schema.help: Provide any dietary restrictions you have.

input_schema.name: days
input_schema.label: Number of days
input_schema.help: The number of days of meal plans you want; default is a week.

input_schema.name: calories
input_schema.label: Daily target calories
input_schema.help: Enter your daily target for calories.
